metadata.Title: CVE-2023-4147 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - high.
metadata.Description: A use-after-free flaw was found in the Linux kernelâ€™s Netfilter functionality when adding a rule with NFTA_RULE_CHAIN_ID. This flaw allows a local user to crash or escalate their privileges on the system.

notes.Note: rodrigo-zaiden> same fix commit as CVE-2023-3995, one or the other will likely be marked as duplicated.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
